author: Staff Reporter
text:
Arambakkam Police in Tiruvallur district have arrested Vijay, a lorry driver, on charges of murdering a 17-year-old girl in Gummidipoondi.

The girl was killed on Friday at her home in Elavoor village and following a complaint from her mother, the Arambakkam police arrested Vijay of Kammarpalayam.

According to the police, Vijay had broken into their house near Gummidipoondi and murdered the minor. Police said the two had known each other for some time. However, the exact motive behind the murder is unknown.

The accused was produced before the District Court and remanded in judicial custody.
title: Lorry driver held for murder of girl in Tiruvallur
